software.description:
A matlab-based code for skull stripping on infant and adult MR images.

Please refer to below papers for details:

"LABEL: Pediatric Brain Extraction Using Learning-based Meta-algorithm", Neuroimage 62(3):1975â€“1986, Sep. 2012. [Feng Shi, Li Wang, Yakang Dai, John H Gilmore, Weili Lin, Dinggang Shen]
